Yoga Schedule September 18th - November 3rd

Day Time Class (7-week session)
Mondays 5:00pm - 6:00pm Gentle/Mixed Levels Hatha Yoga @ River City Therapy & Wellness
Tuesdays 9:00am - 10:15am Mixed Levels Hatha Yoga with Flow @ Sanctuary on Church
Thursdays 5:30pm - 6:45pm Mixed Levels Hatha Yoga with Flow @ Sanctuary on Church

Class Fees

*Please note that there are different class fees for each location.

River City Therapy and Wellness Studio

Session Rate available, $10/class, to be paid at the start of a session. Session payment is to be used for only the current session. Missed classes cannot be made up in another session. No exceptions.

Drop-In Fee is $12/class

Yoga Class Cards for 10 classes are $108 and may be used at any time.

Sanctuary On Church

Session Rate available, $13/class, to be paid at the start of a session. Session payment is to be used for only the current session. Missed classes cannot be made up in another session. No exceptions.

Drop-In Fee is $15/class

Yoga Class Cards for 10 classes are $135 and may be used at any time.

All levels are welcome. Classes at Idylwild Yoga are with Nicole Heath unless otherwise specified.
